Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
Created by Hein Ferman <13-06-2001
05.07.2012 JH SCR 16958 Addded test on Administration currency of BADP_ADMNOINITIAL must be equal to BADT_BANK_ADMNO
29.03.2012 SH SCR17202 Added test on BADP_BPOD_ID > 0 if Transfer back to debtor is checked; removed test
that bank account debtor is mandatory if BADP_RESTITUE is set to Y;
Removed PI.BADP_BANKIDDEBTOR/PI.BADP_BANKACCOUNTDEBTOR (no longer modifiable)
05.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Replaced table CURR by CURA
24.04.2009 SH SCR14435 Added test that bank currency must be = client currency
in case of FCI clients
27.11.2008 GB SCR14139 added test If the row exists in LEDGER
but LDGR_MANUALBOOKINGNOTALL = Y
24.05.2005 BT SCR8344 added confirmation box for BADP_RESTITUTE
28.09.2004 SH SCR7090 Added confirmation box (GB007) where user has to confirm
storno indication, before starting DB updates
06.07.2004 SH SCR6459 Added new test BADP_ADMNOLEDGER <> ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE
08.03.2004 SH SCR5664 Added test if pi.BADP_EXCHGRATE_TYPE > 0 then it has to be
in table CODE with CODE_TYPE = 440 and user language
04.09.2003 SH SCR4258 If ADML_LTYP_TYPE = 5 then the fields
- BADP_ADMNOINITIAL / BADP_CLNTNOINITIAL / BADP_ADMNOLEDGER and
- BADP_LEDGER are all mandatory (PH0163)
17.06.2003 SH SCR3797 Removed test on BADP_DEBC_DEBC
15.05.2003 SH SCR3517 Added new parameters for checking the new exchange fields
06.02.2003 SH SCR2956 Check BADP_AMOUNTPAYCURR <> 0 only if
- BADP_AMOUNTACCCURR <> 0
25.09.2002 SH Switched Select Virtuals to Paramters for parameters
- add new parameter pi.BADP_COST_NO and add validation
-- Validation CLNTNO_INITIAL
-- Validation Contract status
-- Administration currency of BADP_ADMNOINITIAL must be equal to BADT_BANK_ADMNO
-- For FCI clients the bankaccount currency must be the same as the client curr.
-- Validation LEDGER
-- If the row exists in LEDGER but LDGR_MANUALBOOKINGNOTALL = Y
-- If ADML_LTYP_TYPE = 5 then the fields ADMNO, CLNTNO, ADMNOLEDGER and
LEDGERNO are mandatory
-- Validation BADP_ADMNOLEDGER = ADMN_ADMNOGLPACKAGE
-- Validation COST_NO, mandatory if LDGR_COST_NO_MANDATORY='Y'
-- Validation COST_NO, wrong BADP_COST_NO
-- Validation Amountpaycurr
-- Validation Payment currency
Exchange rate type and exchange rate are mandatory
If exchange rate type is mandatory and > 0 then it has to be in table CODE
with CODE_TYPE = 440
Storno indication is set, user has to confirm before starting DB updates
... if user did not confirmed the storno indication --> Error
24.05.2005 BT SCR8344 added confirmation box for BADP_RESTITUTE.
'Transfer back to debtor' is set, user has to confirm before starting DB updates
... if user did not confirmed the 'Transfer to debtor is set'--> Error
